item.title: Safeguard Data in IOS Apps Using Swift
item.description: In today’s mobile‑first world, safeguarding our apps’ most sensitive data — whether it lives in memory or on disk — is non‑negotiable. In this guide, we’ll explore how we can protect data in our apps by leveraging Swift‑native APIs and industry best practices.

item.title: Various ways to secure network traffic for mobile apps
